name: askless
description: Framework that facilitates building servers for JavaScript and Flutter Apps

scripts.bundle-dev: rimraf dist && tsc --outDir dist/temp && webpack --env.development && rimraf dist/temp
scripts.bundle-prod: rimraf dist && tsc --outDir dist/temp && webpack --env.production && rimraf dist/temp
scripts.catalog-ts: rimraf example/catalog-tscompiled && npm run bundle-dev && npx tsc example/catalog-ts/index.ts --outDir example/catalog-tscompiled && node example/catalog-tscompiled/index.js
scripts.tracking-ts: rimraf example/tracking-tscompiled && npm run bundle-dev && npx tsc example/tracking-ts/index.ts --outDir example/tracking-tscompiled && node example/tracking-tscompiled/index.js

author: Rodrigo Jo√£o Bertotti <rodrigo@wisetap.dev>
